Name: Hail of Arrows
Ability: Deal X damage among attacking creatures

Name: Pacifism
Ability: Enchant a creature, the enchanted creature can’t attack or block

Name: Chastise
Ability: Destroy target attacking creature and gain life equal to its power

Name: Sword to Plowshares
Ability: Exile target creature, its controller gains life equal to its power

Name: Wrath of God
Ability: Destroy all creatures, they can’t be regenerated

Name: Moat
Ability: You can only be attacked by creatures with flying

Name: Enlightened Tutor
Ability: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment, reveal it, shuffle, and place it on top of your deck

Name: Empyrial Armor
Ability: Enchant a creature, enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand

Name: Exalted Angel
Ability: Flying, whenever Exalted Angel deals damage you gain an equal amount of life. Morph 2 + 2P (may be played face down as a 2/2 creature for 3 then turned face up for its morph cost)

Name: Mother of Runes
Ability: ->: Target creature you control gains protection from a color of your choice until the end of turn

Name: Black Vise
Ability: When Black Vise enters the battle field choose a player. That player takes (the # of cards in their hand – 4) damage

Name: Winter Orb
Ability: While Winter Orb is untapped all players may only untap one land during their untap step

Name: Icy Manipulator
Ability: 1 + T: Tap target artifact, creature, or land
